text: Rain speaks in numbers Blue traces the road Low-voltage thunder Guides me home I slow my breathing I follow the line Across the lattice Into your design Stay in the signal Stay in the signal Keep the pattern breathing Stay in the signal ooh ooh — aaah aaah Glass carries echoes Circuits confess Your whispered checksum Spells out a yes Hold — release Phase — align We turn the noise Into a sign Stay in the signal Stay in the signal Keep the pattern breathing Stay in the signal Stay in the signal
